title: The Judge

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose three players to Judge.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Learn which of the three players seems the most suspicious compared to the other two.
- Players who are framed will always seem the most suspicious.
- Players who are not the same faction as the other two seem the second-most suspicious.
- Players who have killed someone seem the third-most suspicious.
 - If all 3 players have the same level of suspicion, you are told so.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Rid your county of rapscallions and varmint.

desc:
Post 5344
*He observes those before him, then he forms an opinion. This judgement is the basis for whether or not he will destroy what he understands to be true.*
